TopicTitle: How do I view all my stages in the Vehicle Assembly station?

Articles.Content:
I\'ve been building rockets since the weekend (no Mun landing yet, but it\'s close), and I run into trouble when I add too many stages - the icons go off the top of the screen and there\'s no easy means of getting at them.

Is there a control to scroll up and down the stages?
Hover your mouse over the stage section and use mouse wheel to scroll up and down.
Home/End will also scroll the stages up/down - sometimes more precise than using the mouse, especially if you\'re getting \'big build lag\'.
Thanks - I\'ll use Home/End as the mouse scroll wheel doesn\'t work in Wine/Linux.

Colmo, I may be able to help you with that.
